talked-to-jessica.text: I see that you got the cave key from Jessica, that's great, now you can enter the case, but be aware that there are some monsters there.
You can fight against them, but remember: your actions have limited amounts of PP and they just restore after the battle is finished, have that in mind.
Before you go, you better have this item, it will help you inside the cave.

didn't-talk-to-jessica.text: Have you talked to Jessica? You probably should, she has something for you.
